import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function FnbDashboard() { const [activeItem, setActiveItem] = useState("Menu & Inventory"); const navigate = useNavigate(); const menuItems = [ "Menu & Inventory", "Order Management", "Reports & Analytics", "Supplier Management", "Kitchen Operations", ]; const handleSignOut = () => { navigate("/fnb/signin"); }; return (
